statements: SELECT user_id, material_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type, user_id, material_id FROM user_interactions;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT material_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date > NOW();
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, material_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT material_id, interaction_type, user_id FROM user_interactions WHERE material_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY interaction_type;
SELECT interaction_type, user_id, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 2 AND interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, material_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 3 AND material_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('view', 'download') ORDER BY user_id, interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, material_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM user_interactions;
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, recommended_materials FROM learning_recommendations WHERE recommendation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE material_id = 10 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, recommendation_date, recommended_materials FROM learning_recommendations WHERE user_id = 20 ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 15 AND interaction_type = 'like'
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_date FROM learning_recommendations WHERE user_id = 5 OR user_id = 10 ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC
SELECT user_id, material_id FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT material_id, material_name, publish_date FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Book';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_type, COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM materials GROUP BY material_type;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, material_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'book' ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'view' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, title, price FROM courses WHERE price < 100;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT user_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM user_courses ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, title, description FROM courses ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT username, email, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, course_id, enrollment_date, completion_status FROM user_courses WHERE completion_status = true;

SELECT u.username, c.title, c.description, uc.enrollment_date FROM users u INNER JOIN user_courses uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id INNER JOIN courses c ON uc.course_id = c.course_id WHERE u.first_name = 'John' AND uc.completion_status = false;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY date_registered DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM Courses WHERE instructor_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS TotalInteractions FROM Interactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY TotalInteractions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM Courses ORDER BY course_duration DESC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, interaction_type FROM Interactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, recommended_course_id FROM Recommendations WHERE user_id = 12345;
